segment.source: Get set up
segment.target: Get set up

segment.source: It's easier than you think to get set up.
segment.target: It's easier than you think to get set up.

segment.source: Follow these instructions and start creating Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps for Windows 10.
segment.target: Follow these instructions and start creating Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps for Windows 10.

segment.source: Get set up
segment.target: Get set up

segment.source: It's easier than you think to get set up.
segment.target: It's easier than you think to get set up.

segment.source: Follow these instructions and start creating Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps for Windows 10.
segment.target: Follow these instructions and start creating Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps for Windows 10.

segment.source: 1. Get Windows 10
segment.target: 1. Get Windows 10

segment.source: To develop UWP apps, you need the latest version of Windows.
segment.target: To develop UWP apps, you need the latest version of Windows.

segment.source: Get Windows 10 online
segment.target: Get Windows 10 online

segment.source: Are you an MSDN subscriber?
segment.target: Are you an MSDN subscriber?

segment.source: You can get ISO downloads here:
segment.target: You can get ISO downloads here:

segment.source: Get Windows 10 from MSDN Subscriber Downloads
segment.target: Get Windows 10 from MSDN Subscriber Downloads

segment.source: 2. Download or update Visual Studio
segment.target: 2. Download or update Visual Studio

segment.source: Microsoft Visual Studio 2015 helps you design, code, test, and debug your apps.
segment.target: Microsoft Visual Studio 2015 helps you design, code, test, and debug your apps.

segment.source: If you don't already have Visual Studio 2015, click this link to install the free Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2015.
segment.target: If you don't already have Visual Studio 2015, click this link to install the free Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2015.

segment.source: This download includes device and phone simulators for testing your apps:
segment.target: This download includes device and phone simulators for testing your apps:

segment.source: Download Windows 10 developer tools
segment.target: Download Windows 10 developer tools

segment.source: 3. Enable your device for development
segment.target: 3. Enable your device for development

segment.source: It’s important to test your UWP apps on a real PCs and phones.
segment.target: It’s important to test your UWP apps on a real PCs and phones.

segment.source: Before you can deploy apps to your PC or Windows Phone, you have to enable it for development.
segment.target: Before you can deploy apps to your PC or Windows Phone, you have to enable it for development.

segment.source: For detailed instructions, see Enable your device for development.
segment.target: For detailed instructions, see Enable your device for development.

segment.source: 4. Register as an app developer
segment.target: 4. Register as an app developer

segment.source: You can start developing apps now, but before you can submit them to the store, you need a developer account.
segment.target: You can start developing apps now, but before you can submit them to the store, you need a developer account.

segment.source: To get a developer account, go to the Sign up page.
segment.target: To get a developer account, go to the Sign up page.

segment.source: What's next?
segment.target: What's next?

segment.source: After you've installed the tools and gotten a developer license or a developer account, use our tutorials to create your first app:
segment.target: After you've installed the tools and gotten a developer license or a developer account, use our tutorials to create your first app:

segment.source: Create your first app tutorials
segment.target: Create your first app tutorials

segment.source: Want more tools and downloads?
segment.target: Want more tools and downloads?

segment.source: For the complete list of tools and downloads, see Downloads.
segment.target: For the complete list of tools and downloads, see Downloads.
